cmput301.f13t01.model

Class StoryFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.model.StoryFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StoryFragment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    StoryFragment object, essentially a single page for a story. Has title and description attributes. Composed of Content and Annotations, which implement the Media interface. Content and Annotations can be one of: Text, Image, Video, Sound
    Author:
    Jesse Chu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
